lead_paragraph: LONSDALE--John Whittaker, "Jack" of Warren, VT, died December 28, 2015, at age 81. Born in New York, Jack graduated of St. Paul's School, Concord, NH, and Harvard College '57. After serving in the United States Navy, Jack worked on Wall Street. In The 1970s, he moved to Vermont to pursue entrepreneurial interests. Jack became a legendary figure in the Sugarbush Valley, he leaves many great friends behind. Jack is survived by his son, Patrick, of Ben Lomond, CA; his sister, Susan Iglehart, of Glyndon, MD; two grandchildren; three nieces and nephews; and six grand nieces and nephews. Funeral services will be conducted by St. Dunston's Episcopal Church at Our Lady of the Snows in Waitsfield, VT on Saturday, January 23, 2016 at 2pm. In lieu of flowers, donations in his memory may be made to High Fives Foundation at: www.highfivesfoundation.org 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LONSDALE, JOHN WHITTAKER
